result.eng: Where did you learn your Irish?
result.ga: Cár fhoghlaim tú do chuid Gaeilge
result.orig: Cár fhoghlaim tú do chuid Gaeilge
result.html: Cár fhoghlaim tú do chuid GaeilgeWhere did you learn your Irish?
result.ponchtml: Cár ḟoġlaim tú do ċuid GaeilgeWhere did you learn your Irish?

result.eng: What made you want to learn Irish?
result.ga: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.orig: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.html: Céard a thug ort an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?
result.ponchtml: Céard a ṫug ort an Ġaeilge a ḟoġlaimWhat made you want to learn Irish?

result.eng: It is worthwhile to learn Irish.
result.ga: Is fiú an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.orig: Is fiú an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaim
result.html: Is fiú an Ghaeilge a fhoghlaimIt is worthwhile to learn Irish.
result.ponchtml: Is fiú an Ġaeilge a ḟoġlaimIt is worthwhile to learn Irish.
